item.title: Configure AWS CLI
item.description: From ChatGPT ;P To configure AWS CLI authentication for deploying applications, you can follow these steps: Install AWS CLI: If you haven’t already, install the AWS CLI on your machine. You can download the AWS CLI installer appropriate for your operating system from the official AWS Command Line Interface documentation. Create AWS IAM User: In the AWS Management Console, navigate to the IAM (Identity and Access Management) service. Create a new IAM user or use an existing one that will be used for authentication.
